message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. This is a fantastic deal considering the value it holds. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $850,000. I hope this revised offer is acceptable to you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, I can't go that low. How about we meet in the middle at $875,000?  This gives us both a fair deal. Let me know your thoughts!
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $860,000. This is the highest I can go while still staying within my budget. I hope this offer meets your expectations.
